cost_comparison.title: Cost Comparison: Why Loretrans is More Cost-Effective?

faq_section.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq_section.description: Everything you need to know about Loretrans

questions.question: How does Loretrans pricing work?
questions.answer: Loretrans offers 300 free characters per translation. For longer texts, we charge 0.1 credits per character beyond the free limit. New users get 500 welcome credits when they register.

questions.question: What languages do you support?
questions.answer: We specialize in 20+ low-resource languages including Haitian Creole, Lao, Swahili, Burmese, Telugu, and more. All languages support bidirectional translation with English.

questions.question: Is there a character limit?
questions.answer: Each translation includes 300 free characters. For longer texts, you can use credits (0.1 credits per character). Register to get 500 welcome credits for extended translations.

questions.question: What file formats do you support?
questions.answer: Currently we support TXT files up to 10MB. PDF, Word, and PowerPoint support is coming soon based on user feedback.

questions.question: Can I translate documents?
questions.answer: Yes! We support PDF, Word (.docx), and PowerPoint (.pptx) file translation. Simply upload your file and we'll extract the text, translate it, and provide you with the results.

questions.question: How does the text-to-speech feature work?
questions.answer: Our text-to-speech feature supports English output with high-quality voice synthesis. Simply click the speaker icon next to any translation to hear it pronounced.

questions.question: Is there a character limit?
questions.answer: Free users can translate up to 1000 characters per request. For longer texts, you can break them into smaller chunks or upload documents for processing.

questions.question: Can I use Loretrans for commercial purposes?
questions.answer: Yes, you can use Loretrans for both personal and commercial purposes. For high-volume commercial use, please contact us about our API services.

faq.q1_answer: Loretrans offers 300 free characters per translation with no registration required. For longer texts, we charge 0.1 credits per character beyond the free limit. New users receive 500 welcome credits when they register, perfect for translating longer documents.
faq.q3_answer: Currently we support TXT files up to 10MB. We're actively developing support for PDF, Microsoft Word (.doc, .docx), and PowerPoint (.ppt, .pptx) formats based on user feedback.
faq.q4_answer: Our translations use Meta's NLLB model, specifically trained for low-resource languages. We offer 300 free characters per translation, with additional characters at 0.1 credits each. For example, a 1000-character text costs 70 credits (300 free + 700Ã—0.1). Register to get 500 welcome credits.
faq.q2_answer: We specialize in 20+ low-resource languages often poorly supported by mainstream services. Using Meta's NLLB model, we provide superior accuracy for languages like Haitian Creole, Lao, Swahili, and Burmese.
faq.q5_title: Do I need to create an account?
faq.q5_answer: No account needed for 300-character translations. However, registering gives you 500 welcome credits, translation history, priority support, and access to upcoming features like document translation.
faq.q6_answer: Credits are used for translations over 300 characters at 0.1 credits per character. New users get 500 welcome credits (worth 5000 characters). Credits never expire and can be topped up anytime.

meta.title: About Loretrans - Professional Translation for Low-Resource Languages
meta.description: Learn about Loretrans, the leading translation platform for small languages to English. Powered by Meta NLLB model with 20+ supported languages.

hero.title: About Loretrans
hero.description: Professional translation platform dedicated to connecting low-resource languages with the world through accurate English translation.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.p1: We believe every language deserves to be heard. Loretrans bridges the communication gap for speakers of low-resource languages, providing accurate and accessible translation services to English.
mission.p2: Powered by Meta's state-of-the-art NLLB (No Language Left Behind) model, we support over 20 languages that are often overlooked by mainstream translation services.

accessibility.title: Global Accessibility
accessibility.description: Making translation accessible for speakers of languages with limited digital resources.

accuracy.title: Fast & Accurate
accuracy.description: Advanced AI technology delivers high-quality translations in seconds.

privacy.title: Privacy First
privacy.description: Your translations are not stored. We respect your privacy and data security.

supported_languages.title: Supported Languages
supported_languages.description: We support {count} low-resource languages with more being added regularly.
supported_languages.request_cta_description: Don't see your language? We're constantly expanding our language support.

technology.title: Powered by Advanced AI
technology.description: Loretrans uses Meta's NLLB (No Language Left Behind) model, specifically designed to provide high-quality translation for low-resource languages that traditional systems struggle with.

cultural_preservation.title: Cultural Preservation
cultural_preservation.description: Supporting linguistic diversity and helping preserve cultural heritage through technology.

community_driven.title: Community Driven
community_driven.description: Built with feedback from native speakers and language communities worldwide.

continuous_improvement.title: Continuous Improvement
continuous_improvement.description: Regular model updates and improvements to provide better translation quality.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1_title: What makes Loretrans different from other translation services?
faq.q1_answer: Loretrans specializes in low-resource languages that are often poorly supported by mainstream translation services. We use Meta's NLLB model, which is specifically designed for these languages, ensuring better accuracy and cultural context.
faq.q2_title: Is my data safe and private?
faq.q2_answer: Yes, we prioritize your privacy. We don't store your translations or personal data. All translations are processed securely and deleted immediately after delivery. For document translations, files are automatically removed after download.
faq.q3_title: What file formats do you support for document translation?
faq.q3_answer: We currently support PDF, Microsoft Word (.doc, .docx), PowerPoint (.ppt, .pptx), and plain text (.txt) files. We're working on adding support for more formats based on user feedback.
faq.q4_answer: Our translations are powered by Meta's state-of-the-art NLLB model, which has been trained specifically on low-resource languages. While no automated translation is perfect, our system provides significantly better results for small languages compared to traditional services.
faq.q5_title: Can I translate from English to my language?
faq.q5_answer: Yes! While our primary focus is translating from low-resource languages to English, we also support reverse translation from English to supported languages. Just use the language selector to choose your desired translation direction.
faq.q6_title: Do you offer API access for developers?
faq.q6_answer: We're currently developing API access for developers and businesses. If you're interested in integrating our translation capabilities into your application, please contact us for early access information.

cta_section.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta_section.description: Experience accurate translation for your language today. Whether it's a quick text or a full document, Loretrans is here to help you communicate with the world.

other_languages.title: Try Other Languages
other_languages.description: Explore translation for other low-resource languages

faq.title: Text Translation FAQ
faq.description: Everything you need to know about our text translation service
faq.q1_title: How much does text translation cost?
faq.q1_answer: Each translation includes 300 free characters. For longer texts, we charge 0.1 credits per character. Register to get 500 welcome credits for extended translations.
faq.q2_answer: We specialize in low-resource languages that are often poorly supported by mainstream translation services. We currently support Haitian Creole, Lao, Swahili, Burmese, Telugu, Chinese, and more. All languages support bidirectional translation with English.
faq.q3_answer: Our translations are powered by Meta's NLLB (No Language Left Behind) model, which is specifically designed for low-resource languages. While no automated translation is perfect, NLLB provides significantly better accuracy for small languages compared to traditional translation services.
faq.q4_title: Do I need to create an account?
faq.q4_answer: No account required for 300-character translations. However, registering gives you 500 bonus credits, translation history, and access to premium features.
faq.q5_title: Can I translate from English to other languages?
faq.q5_answer: Yes! All our supported languages work bidirectionally. You can translate from English to any supported language, or from any supported language to English. Just use the language selector to choose your desired translation direction.
faq.q6_answer: Each translation includes 300 free characters. For longer texts, use credits (0.1 per character). New users get 500 welcome credits when they register.

cta.description: Translate longer texts and documents with our premium features

features.fast_desc: Get instant translations powered by advanced AI models. No waiting, no delays.
features.accurate_desc: Powered by Meta's NLLB model, ensuring high-quality translations for all supported languages.
features.free_desc: 300 characters free per translation. Register for 500 bonus credits to translate longer texts.

how_to.title: How to Use the Text Translator
how_to.step1_desc: Choose your source language and target language (English) from the dropdown menus.
how_to.step2_desc: Type or paste your text in the input box. Up to 1000 characters supported.
how_to.step3_desc: Click translate and instantly get your result. Copy or listen to the translation.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Common questions about low-resource language translation

cta.title: Ready to Start Translating?
cta.subtitle: Experience professional low-resource language translation service, completely free under 500 characters

q1.question: Which languages are supported for translation?
q1.answer: We focus on low-resource language translation, supporting 20+ languages that Google Translate doesn't cover well, including Haitian Creole, Lao, Swahili, Burmese, Telugu, and more.

q2.question: How accurate is the translation?
q2.answer: Based on Meta's NLLB model, our translation accuracy exceeds 90%. Especially for low-resource languages, we are more professional and accurate than traditional translation tools.

q3.question: What is the free quota?
q3.answer: Under 500 characters is completely free, no registration required. Registered users also get 500 credit bonus, which can translate approximately 50,000 characters of long text.

q4.question: How are translation fees calculated?
q4.answer: Text over 500 characters is charged at 0.1 credits per character. For example, translating 1000 characters requires 50 credits, costing about $0.05, saving 99% compared to human translation.

q5.question: Which file formats are supported?
q5.answer: In addition to text translation, we also support translation of document formats like PDF, Word, PPT. Document translation automatically extracts text while maintaining original formatting.

q6.question: Can translation results be saved?
q6.answer: Translation history for registered users is automatically saved. Starter plan saves for 7 days, Basic plan for 30 days, Pro plan for 90 days, Business plan saves indefinitely.

Footer.tagline: Professional translation for low-resource languages to English. Powered by Meta NLLB AI technology.
Footer.powered_by: Powered by Meta NLLB AI Technology

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our pricing

credit_calculation.question: How are credits calculated?
credit_calculation.answer: Under 300 characters is completely free, excess is charged at 0.1 credits/character. For example: translating 1000 characters requires 70 credits.

expiration.question: Do credits expire?
expiration.answer: No, your credits never expire. Once purchased, they remain in your account until used.

payment_methods.question: What payment methods do you support?
payment_methods.answer: We support major credit cards and debit cards through our secure Creem payment system.

bulk_discount.question: Do you offer bulk discounts?
bulk_discount.answer: Yes! Our larger packages offer significant savings - up to 40% off with the Enterprise package. The more credits you purchase, the better the value.

unused_credits.question: What happens to unused credits?
unused_credits.answer: Unused credits remain in your account until their expiration date. You can check your credit balance and expiration dates in your account dashboard.

business_invoicing.question: Do you provide invoices for business purchases?
business_invoicing.answer: Yes, we provide detailed invoices for all purchases. Business customers can access invoices through their account dashboard or contact support for assistance.

api_pricing.question: How does API pricing work?
api_pricing.answer: API access is included with Business and Enterprise packages. API usage consumes credits at the same rate as web translations - 0.1 credits per character over 500.

faq.contact_support: Have more questions? Contact our support team

upgrade_plan.question: Can I upgrade my plan anytime?
upgrade_plan.answer: Absolutely! You can purchase additional credit packages anytime, and credits will be added to your account immediately.
